thread.title: Chicago Flag Shoe Hoodie

title: Chicago Flag Shoe Hoodie
text: SKU: SC_FlagShoeHoodie Quick Overview: Commemorate your Chicago marathon experience with this unisex hoodie. Our exclusive design features a running shoe emblazoned with the stars of our city's flag. 60% Combed and Ringspun Cotton / 40% Polyester. Regular Fit. Available in Light Heather Grey Expedited shipping available. Please select option, below, before adding to cart. Standard order processing times still apply. Not valid on international orders. Regular Price: $45.00
